column4: Hi, i have a problem with GRUB, it gives me error 21 after trying to load stage 1.5 it is a FRESH install with no dual boot. any help would be appreciated
error 21 means selected disk does not exist,  most likely your (hd0,0) thing in the root line is wrong , possibly a uuid line if you have those
meet me in #grub , too busy in here
